title: 14 day suspension and no information on why...
body: my account was just suspended and I was not given any reasoning behind why... http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=glandline I was in a game with what i thought to be a fake rioter so i flamed him for being a fraud/imitator. if its due to being toxic in chat would i not get a chat log to show? not asking for unban just reasoning to why.

replies.body: It does look like this punishment was toxic chat related. Go ahead and shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our agents can provide the logs and go over them with you there since you aren't seeing them for some reason.

Depending on the offense, it is possible that the chat logs may have glitched or it may not have been possible to display the chat to you. Currently the reform cards in client are unable to display pre or post game chat, and so if that was the reason for the offense you may not have gotten information.

I recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) and a Player Behavior agent can look into this for you and either provide context or reverse it if it was in error or a glitch.
